description:
*** BONUS ***
3 New Maps Added
- DC Bus - All Routes
- DC Circulator
- Virginia Bus

If you don't live in Washington D.C. then you'll surely visit.  These maps are for resident and visitor alike.

Pan & Zoom the DC Metro map, DC Bus maps (Central and Pentagon area), the Baltimore Metro maps,and the Maryland Marc and Maryland Light Rail maps.

The maps are built into the application and available when you need maps the most.  When you're underground.  No wifi or 3g necessary.

*** Update *** Latest Metro Map & Full integration of the new TMaps DC 2011 Closest Metro app.  Find the nearest metro to you and the next metro departure time (and DC weather too!).
